entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked class should contain Xor and Not members #67809
  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked operation should allow for nint #67808
  • FreeBSD's Interop.Process.cs has an off-by-1000 error #67807
  • The dynamic type created is thrown FileLoadException when using the GetCustomAttributes method #67802
  • Avx2.IsSupported not work correctly for release CoreRun #67798
  • RegexIgnoreCase Outerloop is causing OOM exceptions on some platforms #67793
    7.0.0
  • The !name2ee command of SOS doesn't work in .Net 6 #67791
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator tool cannot be installed as a tool #67789

Closed

  • It was not possible to find any installed .NET Core SDKs *when running in a docker container* #67796
  • [NativeAOT] ILC: AOT analysis error IL1005 Vararg call not supported #67804
  • AddRemoveFromDifferentThreads.ConcurrentStack hangs with NativeAOT #66987
  • Docs: File `src/Native/format-code.sh` is referenced even though it doesn't exist #67800
  • Json.net can't deserialize simple struct, throws System.NullReferenceException #67781
  • [iOS/tvOS] RegexCultureTests.Match_In_Different_Cultures test failures #60697
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][tests] Regex source generator test failures #60899
  • Invoke with 'null' arg doesn't work when the target arg is a Nullable byref #67269
    7.0.0
  • Build of coreclr fails with musl 1.2.3 #67763
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.divremTest.RunDivRem_TwoLargeBI #67413

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete some Win9x-specific code and comments #67814
    area-VM-coreclr
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • BlockingCollection<T>.Take method, XML documentation corrections #67812
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for arm64 #67811
    area-System.Memory
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Adding Regex.EnumerateMatches #67794
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • perf: Don't build in the payload directory on helix #67792
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean up write barrier macros #67790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use CRT implementation of memset/memcpy #67788
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove Roslyn workaround in NativeAOT smoke test #67795
  • GC: Correctly align `exclusive_sync.alloc_objects` #67799
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup unused code and remove sparc and mips architectures #67503
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix for the elusive suspension hang on Win7 WOW64 #67628
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding class target to RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute #67778
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • FabricBot config: Viktor is back #67787
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Always run CopyAllNativeProjectReferenceBinaries #67718
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update coding-style.md #67801
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Rewrite RegexPrefixAnalyzer.FindFirstCharClass #67732
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOf for OrdinalIgnoreCase #67758
    area-System.Globalization
  • Re-adding some tests that were commented out now that IgnoreCase work is done #67709
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update C# compiler and revert workaround #67780
    area-Build-mono
  • [runtime] copy updated byref nullables after invoke #67652
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix some minor reflection bugs #67571
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono]Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Change SuperPMI asm diffs relocation handling #67688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix a JIT formatting issue #67785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
    area-Meta
  • Improve List performance in IEnumerable.SequenceEqual #67722
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Adding missing SDK assets for Publish #67765
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • fix build for musl 1.2.3 #67772
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use "..."u8 in dotnet/runtime #67733
    area-Meta
  • Fix exception thrown when MsQuicStream write direction is locally aborted #67753
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][llvm] Refactor code to make it easier to support LLVM 13.x in … #67692
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-wasm pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove COM from profiler messages #67774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation, needs-author-action
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #67527
    area-Meta
  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add Async Stream-based signatures #67786
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Limitations that we're not planning to address right now #155

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] added a null check #1884

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Can not install on Ubuntu 22.04 (jammy) due to libssl1.1 dependency #24759

Updated

  • Cannot debug on CentOS Stream 9 from Visual Studio 2022 (Kernel 5.14) #24576

PullRequests

Updated

  • Don't retarget testhost #24770
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1708549 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve `nameof` completion #60669
  • ESLint style single line ignore and lightbulb improvements #60668

Closed

  • Odd behaviour with async method declaration: wrong types suggestion #60341
    17.3
  • Restore back C# and VB CodeStyle layer unit test projects #60666
    17.3
  • VS tries to complete xml summary inside a string #60670
  • IDE information diagnostics displayed in the VS Code problems pane do not surface via dotnet build #60620
  • RequestExecutionQueue fails to dispose of a linked CancellationTokenSource #60649

PullRequests

Created

  • Trim unnessasary leading lines when removing usings #60672
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extract base class extracting generic type parameter now (#55871) #60671
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Pass options to FixAllAsync, simplify CodeAction registration #60665
    Area-IDE
  • Allow shared projects to specify a real project to proxy too for building and testing in VS Code #60664
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update csc.dll path in launch.json #60663
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Async suggestions improvements #60528
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Restore CodeStyle test projects #60667
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Update Typescript VS interface #60635
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Community
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Run continuation to dispose of cancellation token source #60653
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Global indentation options - take 2 #60565
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #60677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60676
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60675
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60674
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60490
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove IDynamicFileInfo-added syntax trees to attempt to improve perf #60531
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • use dotnet to build roslyn by default #60659
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server RuntimeCompilation like in Razor pages #41126
  • Asp.Net Core identity with source generators #41125
  • Dontnet core 3.1 --->6.0 both the cases Error: rzc generate exited with code -2147450730 #41122
  • Allow property navigation for `ChildComponent` rendering when using `CascadingTypeParameter` #41120

Closed

  • Write old code with .net 6 #41096
  • ASP.NET Core IIS hosting failure (In-Process) if a file called "dotnet" is present in the project root. #41089
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: SignalR Hub methods try to resolve parameters from DI #39795
    Discussions
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: API Controllers Actions try to infer parameters from DI #40071
    Discussions
  • Small grammar mistake in ./wiki/Engineering-guidelines#coding-guidelines #41121

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41123
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Updated

  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    community-contribution
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build for Android outputs Windows error #5954
  • Application cannot be started on Windows - WINAPPSDKGENERATEPROJECTPRIFILE #5953
  • cache .NET .dll.so #5952
  • Fault in framework code #5951
  • [mauipalooza] Button background doesn't render gradient #5950
  • [mauipalooza] Layout width is wrong and elements are misaligned #5949
  • [mauipalooza] ImageButton isn't clipping on Android #5948
  • [mauipalooza] DatePicker focus only works first time #5947
  • VisualStateGroup System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation. #5946
  • Shell Absolute Navigation Crashes when a title view is set to each shell page. #5944
  • FontImageSource: "Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: width and height must be > 0" on some devices #5943
  • Can't load types from xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/dotnet/2021/maui after a successful migration from Xamarin Forms to MAUI #5942
  • Publish window MAUI app - create executable #5940
  • Installing MAUI with dotnet installed with brew fails #5939
  • Large Images Not Shown Correctly #5938

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Use static AppOriginUri everywhere #5941
  • Keep the text wrapping/truncation and max lines stuff in Controls #5936

Updated

  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Update iOS / Mac Catalyst Blazor Hybrid APIs #5919
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/desktop 🖥️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remote provider with a proper API controller as endpoint #27793
  • Make Scaffold generate field as CLR Enum #27792
